message.Name: message
message.Description: Sets the declaration as a message.

Parameters.Name: req
Parameters.Description: Sets the message as a request.

next@const.Name: next
next@const.Description: Built-in annotation for the next compiler.

next@enum.Name: next
next@enum.Description: Built-in annotation for the next compiler.

next@interface.Name: next

next@interface.method.Name: next

next@interface.method.parameter.Description: Built-in annotation for the next compiler.

next@package.Name: next

next@struct.Name: next

next@struct.field.Name: next

Parameters.Name: default
Parameters.Description: Sets the default value for optional fields.

*_alias.Name: .+_alias
*_alias.Description: Sets the alias name for target languages.

*_imports.Name: .+_imports
*_imports.Description: Sets the import declarations for target languages.

*_package.Name: .+_package
*_package.Description: Sets the package name for target languages.

*_type.Name: .+_type
*_type.Description: Sets the type name for target languages.

available.Name: available
available.Description: Sets the available expression for the declaration.

error.Name: error
error.Description: Indicates the method returns an error.

mut.Name: mut
mut.Description: Sets object or parameter as mutable.

type.Name: type
type.Description: Sets the type for enum members.
